snippet: Bank of America and Citigroup have plenty in common, and investors will be watching to see how the two match up when bank earnings are revealed in the coming weeks, Nelson D. Schwartz of The New York Times reports.
abstract: Bank of America and Citigroup have plenty in common, and investors will be watching to see how the two match up when bank earnings are revealed in the coming weeks, Nelson D. Schwartz of The New York Times reports.

headline.main: Evaluating Big Banks, Side by Side
